Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) have many applications in microgrids, but they often face the challenge of maintaining the fuel utilization within a safe range, which affects their lifespan.
Titulo: A Policy optimization-based Deep Reinforcement Learning method for data-driven output voltage control of grid connected solid oxide fuel cell considering operation constraints

Sentencas: To address this issue, we propose a Data-driven Output voltage control (DDD-OVC) approach that treats the SOFC output voltage controller as an intelligent agent.
Titulo: A Policy optimization-based Deep Reinforcement Learning method for data-driven output voltage control of grid connected solid oxide fuel cell considering operation constraints

Sentencas: The agent can design a reward function that incorporates the fuel utilization constraint and learn the optimal control policy through offline training.
Titulo: A Policy optimization-based Deep Reinforcement Learning method for data-driven output voltage control of grid connected solid oxide fuel cell considering operation constraints

Sentencas: The objective is to optimize both the SOFC output voltage control performance and lifetime.
Titulo: A Policy optimization-based Deep Reinforcement Learning method for data-driven output voltage control of grid connected solid oxide fuel cell considering operation constraints

Sentencas: Furthermore, we develop a policy optimization-based Deep Reinforcement Learning (PO-DRL) algorithm that adopts the idea of proximal policy optimization to enhance the learning speed and convergence of the agent, as well as the policy stability and quality of DDD-OVC.
Titulo: A Policy optimization-based Deep Reinforcement Learning method for data-driven output voltage control of grid connected solid oxide fuel cell considering operation constraints

Sentencas: We validate the effectiveness of our method on a 5kW SOFC model.& COPY; 2023 Published by Elsevier Ltd.
Titulo: A Policy optimization-based Deep Reinforcement Learning method for data-driven output voltage control of grid connected solid oxide fuel cell considering operation constraints
